reviewText:
This was one of the best things on TV back in the 90s. It was very well-written even if the last episode left a lot to be desired (in my opinion).
Very good.

I have loved this series since I first saw it back in '96.  I remember when it ws first released on dvd, but didn't have the money to get it as the time. I've collected the first two seasons over the last fifteen years, but this one ad always been elusiuve.  Finally though, I found it (at a decent price too!) It was worth the wait.  I was surprised by the slim package I received since both other seasons, and the picture are the bigger fold out boxes that give each disc its own spot.  However, once I got it, I proceeded to watch the full series from beginning to end for the first time in 20 years.  It was worth the wait.
Great price. Season 3 is hard to find for a good price.
It was a good program, enjoyed it a lot.
A fine, but sad conclusion to a great series.
it didn't work and i have not received my refund
loved this show..glad to have it on DVD
Awesome!

5 out of 5 stars
Why season three of this show is so hard to find is beyond me. This was the lowest price I could find that would play in North America. I panicked a bit when it arrived because the package is the Australian package, not the one pictured, but it is still in the proper format for viewing in North America so I'm very happy.
Great Series.
Great
Last Season. Sad Beginning & Ending.
It was good ;-))))))))) I used to LOVE this show back in the 90s... It was fun to watch it again...

Note the cheaper version of this is NOT made by Sony Entertainment.  It's an "import" and the run time is 960 minutes.  The Sony season 3 has a run time of 971 minutes.  Not sure what you miss in that 11 minutes, if anything?  Does anyone know?
Already had the first two seasons. Waited a very long time for the third one. Loved it. Didn't like the way it ended but vampires do come back!
Season three truly finished the series off, it was very good and entertaining, Five star
This was a gift for a newbie Vampire suspense watcher. He hasn'ts killed me, or bitched me out, so I assume he happy with it
Great series
Great DVDs season 3 complete series
Item was good
Cant really give this a good review as it won't play. Apparently its an Australian version.

The description in the ad says these are for ALL REGIONS...  Opened up my box from Amazon today, excited to have finally found all three seasons of Forever Knight... the first 2 seasons I bought are region 1 like they should be... this season, season 3 says REGION 4 on the DVD CASE!! This would be fine if I lived in Australia! But I live in the middle of the USA! Region 4 DVD's don't play on my DVD / Blu-ray player! Not a happy camper...

This final series tells the tale of Knight's life with his new partner, after a plane crash takes the life of his longtime partner Skakie.

Be aware this DVD is Australian Region 4. It will not play on U.S. DVD players, however I am able to play via the programme 'VLC-Player'
on my PC. And via my now region free Philips Blu-Ray DVD player I have. (Thanks to a friend de region-coding it) so no real harm done, this is NOT a region free DVD as it says in the product review.
Cool series. Sad ending.
I love the series but the box is poorly made
One of my favorite vampire TV shows from awhile ago. I'm glad I was able to find it so I can re-watch it.
It's good! It's a good series!

Third season of Forever Knight is incredible we lose some characters but we gain new characters. An incredible way to end and incredible TV show it is very sad but it is very understandable how the show ends in the last episode this will always be in my top 10 greatest sci-fi horror television shows.
Just as good as when I saw the original series! I love the premise and the actors.
